ygData.subject: Re: [Digest Number 487]
ygData.msgSnippet: I can t speak for everyone else, but I do realize that.  However, my hatred for the Rathe Mountains is SO intense, I d rather run past spectres in oasis than
ygData.messageBody:
I can't speak for everyone else, but I do realize that. However, my hatred
for the Rathe Mountains is SO intense, I'd rather run past spectres in oasis
than go through that zone. Stems from a few bad personal experiences, I
suppose.

-Mikal Stormsong
24th song (FINALLY!), Rathe

>SIDEBAR:
>Why don't people realize that it's THREE zones to Cazic from Arena and >SIX
zones to Cazic from Freeport?? Is there swimming skill just so low >that they
don't want to swim Lake Rathe?

>Crier Sharpsong - 29th on Fennin Ro
